name: Prepared for the Worst
text: Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a [[Broń]] asset and add it to your Ręka. Shuffle your deck.

name: Keen Eye
text:
Trwały.
[free] Spend 2 resources: Dostajesz +1 [intellect] until the end of the phase.
[free] Spend 2 resources: Dostajesz +1 [combat] until the end of the phase.

name: Preposterous Sketches
text:
Play only if there is a clue on your location.
Draw 3 cards.

name: Higher Education
text:
Trwały.
While you have 5 or more cards in your Ręka, Higher Education gains:
"[free] Spend 1 resource: Dostajesz +2 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: Dostajesz +2 [intellect] for this skill test."

flavor: “I never mind being on my own. That’s when I do my best work.”
name: Lone Wolf
text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[reaction] When your turn begins, if there are no other investigators at your location: Gain 1 resource.

name: Streetwise
text: Trwały. [free] Spend 2 resources: Dostajesz +3 [intellect] for this skill test. [free] Spend 2 resources: Dostajesz +3 [agility] for this skill test.

name: Defiance
text: Before revealing chaos tokens for this test, choose one of the following symbols: ([skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing]). Ignore the effects of the chosen symbol during this test (including its modifier).

name: Blood Pact
text:
Trwały.
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: Dostajesz +3 [willpower] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)
[free] Add 1 doom to Blood Pact: Dostajesz +3 [combat] for this skill test. (Limit once per test.)

name: Rise to the Occasion
text: Commit only to a skill test you are performing, and only if the difficulty of that test is at least 2 higher than your base skill value.

name: Scrapper
text:
Trwały.
[free] Spend 1 resource: Dostajesz +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: Dostajesz +1 [agility] for this skill test.

flavor: You can never be too prepared.
name: Emergency Cache
